item.keepsakes.eternal_snowflake.tooltip: <wave a=0.25 f=1.0 w=0.25>A frigid, complex fractal that contains the essence of Winter.</wave>
item.keepsakes.eternal_snowflake.frost_w: - Freezes with a radius of 3 blocks around the player
- Does not require the player to be grounded first
item.keepsakes.harvesters_scythe.tooltip: "<wave a=0.25 f=1.0 w=0.25>It takes a brave man to look death in the eye and claim they don't need help.</wave>"
item.keepsakes.harvesters_scythe.explana: Lifesteal 10% of the damage taken by the target(s)
item.keepsakes.chrysalis_of_eternity.too: "<wave a=0.25 f=1.0 w=0.25>What good are kings in the realm of gods?</wave>"
